text:
Chiyuki...
There's something stuck in your hair...

I-I'm sorry... It seems a stray piece of
embroidery thread got stuck...

No, no, don't worry about it.
Embroidery in the morning?

Yes... I just wanted to make some progress,
even if it's just a little.

Haha, you're really motivated, huh? You even went
out of your way to ask if you could bring it in beforehand.

No, I really...
need to focus more on the training camp...

Haha, it's just a bit of thread, no need to make a fuss.
I said you could bring it, didn't I?

And I won't meddle with
what's important to you, Chiyuki.
As long as you don't push yourself too hard.

...Thank you very much.
I'll make sure to keep that in mind.

Yeah, we have lessons now.
Let's focus.
